english.segment1: We are here. Because of grace. Because of love. We are here. Because of You. Because of You. You are here. Because of grace. Because of love. And you are here. Because of You. Because of You. You fill our hearts. With more than we. Can hold inside. And so we sing
english.segment3: Bridge: Oh, beautiful sound. The joy of Heaven here. Oh, wonderful sound. Love of Heaven now. Oh, beautiful sound. The joy of Heaven here. Oh, wonderful sound. Love of Heaven now. Oh, beautiful sound. The joy of Heaven here. Oh, wonderful sound. Oh, wonderful sound
